Blaion commands
Thanks to our Developers we will have a list of commands to provide information from the server which can be very helpful, here you will have a list with your description of the command.
.premium Use this command to obtain your Character Information.
.changepassword Change your password inside the Server.
.teletocl Use it to transport yourself to the place where the Clan Leader is.
.hellbound Check status Hellbound.
.tvt TVT information status.
.deposit Change 500.000.000 adena for 1 Gold Bar.
.withdraw Change 1 Gold Bar for 500.000.000 adena.
